data.title: Zum recognized in 2025 Reuters Awards for improving student transportation safety. Highly Commended. #innovation
data.description: Zūm, a prominent player in modern student transportation based in REDWOOD CITY, Calif., was recently acknowledged for its efforts to enhance safety, efficiency, and grid resiliency in student transportation. The company received the prestigious "Highly Commended" recognition in Product Innovation. This significant achievement, announced on Oct. 30, 2025, showcases Zūm's dedication to innovation and excellence in the industry. The recognition reflects the company's commitment to providing safe and efficient transportation solutions, ultimately improving the overall quality of student transportation experiences.
What do you guys think?

data.title: $124 trillion wealth transfer faces high risk of loss due to digital asset mismanagement; $5 billion unclaimed assets annually in U.S.
data.description: An article from San Francisco reports on the ongoing largest intergenerational wealth transfer in history, with $124 trillion in U.S. household wealth expected to change hands by 2048. However, there is concern that much of this fortune may vanish into a digital black hole, as an estimated 11-18% of Bitcoin's total supply, worth tens of billions of dollars, is already permanently lost due to forgotten passwords and abandoned accounts. In the U.S. alone, nearly $5 billion annually in unclaimed assets from forgotten accounts and policies are returned by states. Globally, there are tens of billions sitting in "lost" financial accounts. This wealth loss is exacerbated by demographic changes, with digital assets spread across countries, lack of clear succession plans, and childless individuals. Ana Mineva, CEO at DGLegacy, warns that this invisible leakage crisis poses a threat to wealth transfer. The full story is available on Benzinga.com.

data.title: Northwest Bank reduces prime interest rate from 7.25% to 7.00% effective October 30, 2025.
data.description: A financial institution based in Columbus, Ohio, Northwest Bank, has recently announced a reduction in its prime lending rate from 7.25 percent to 7.00 percent, with the change taking effect on October 30, 2025. Northwest Bank provides a wide range of business and personal banking services.

data.title: Armoris Defense to showcase cutting-edge vehicle ballistic protection technology at Las Vegas event on Oct. 30, 2025.
data.description: Armoris Defense is a prominent provider of advanced vehicle armoring solutions, specializing in technology designed for civilian and tactical uses. The company will showcase its cutting-edge ballistic protection technology in Las Vegas on October 30, 2025. This innovation is set to lead the industry in performance, promising enhanced safety and security in various applications.

data.title: Tripti Sinha reappointed as ICANN Board Chair, Sajid Rahman appointed Vice Chair. Three new Board members added.
data.description: Dublin, October 30, 2025 - Tripti Sinha has been reappointed as the Chair of the ICANN Board of Directors, while Sajid Rahman has been appointed as the Vice Chair. Additionally, three new Board members are set to join. This development comes from the Internet Corporation for Assigned Names and Numbers (ICANN).

data.title: Keel Farms in Plant City, Florida offers free meal on Veterans Day as a gesture of gratitude for service members.
data.description: Keel Farms, the location of Keel+Curley Winery and Keel Farms Agrarian Ales and Ciders, will be honoring veterans and active military personnel by offering them a complimentary meal on November 11th as a gesture of gratitude for their service. This initiative will take place in Plant City, Florida, with the event scheduled for Tuesday, November 11, 2025.

data.title: Prepare for Daylight Savings Time on Nov 2 with tips from Life Time's Chief Science Officer. Gain an extra hour of sleep but manage energy and focus adjustments.
data.description: As we approach the clock change on Nov. 2, 2025, in CHANHASSEN, Minn., Americans are set to gain an extra hour of sleep. However, this transition may lead to challenges such as decreased energy, focus, and mood instability. It is important to adopt effective strategies to stay rested and energized during this time.

data.title: Co-Diagnostics CEO to discuss Saudi Arabia agreement in fireside chat on Nov 5th. CODX, patent holder, specializes in molecular diagnostic tests.
data.description: In Salt Lake City on October 30, 2025, Co-Diagnostics, Inc. (Nasdaq: CODX), a leading molecular diagnostics firm known as Co-Dx, revealed plans to conduct a virtual fireside chat session. This company, recognized for its innovative patented technology to create molecular diagnostic tests, aims to engage in discussions during the online event.

data.title: Inovalon drives 70% of Medicare Advantage enrollees in 4+ Star plans, exceeding national averages in 2026 CMS ratings.
data.description: A company based in Bowie, Maryland, Inovalon, is responsible for supplying technology that supports 70% of Medicare Advantage enrollees in plans rated 4 stars or higher. This accomplishment shows that Inovalon surpasses national averages in the 2026 CMS Star Ratings.

data.title: Enerpac Tool Group (NYSE: EPAC) to present at Baird Global Industrial Conf. on Nov 12, 2025 at 2:55 p.m. CT, with CEO and CFO.
data.description: Enerpac Tool Group Corp (NYSE: EPAC) is set to participate in the Baird Global Industrial Conference on November 12, 2025. The presentation will feature Paul Sternlieb, President and CEO, and Darren Kozik, EVP and CFO, at 2:55 p.m. CT. Relevant materials will be accessible on the company's website ahead of the event.

data.title: Plate Rolling Machine Market to reach USD 638.37M by 2034 at 5.1% CAGR. Growth driven by infrastructure development, manufacturing demand, and technological advancements. Capital investment and equipment cost challenges present. Regional manufacturing disparities affect market growth. Automation vs. operator skills driving future trends.
data.description: The article discusses the latest research report by Custom Market Insights on the Plate Rolling Machine Market, where the global market size was valued at approximately USD 431.59 Million in 2024 and is projected to reach USD 447.9 Million in 2025, growing at a compound annual growth rate (CAGR) of about 5.1% to reach around USD 638.37 Million by 2034. The market is driven by the increasing demand for metal shaping and fabrication in various industries like shipbuilding, aerospace, automotive, and energy sectors. Technological advancements such as CNC automation and IoT integration are enhancing the accuracy and efficiency of metal forming processes. Infrastructure development and construction growth, particularly in emerging economies like China and India, are boosting the demand for plate rolling machines. The report also highlights regional manufacturing disparities, industrial applications, manufacturing demand, capital investment challenges, and the importance of balancing automation with operator skill requirements in the market. Key numbers include the projected market size in 2034 at USD 638.37 Million, CAGR growth rate of 5.1%, and the market size in 2024 at USD 431.59 Million.

data.title: Netrio appoints Bobby Hall as VP of Channel Sales to drive partner growth and expand go-to-market strategy.
data.description: Netrio, based in MCKINNEY, Texas, has named Bobby Hall as the Vice President of Channel Sales on Oct. 30, 2025. This move is aimed at enhancing the company's sales leadership. Bobby Hall, a seasoned Channel Sales Executive, will lead efforts to drive partner growth and expand Netrio's Go-To-Market strategy. This strategic appointment is expected to bolster Netrio's initiatives in the channel sales sector, facilitating growth and market expansion.
